name: They Wake in Waves
description:
They awaken in waves..

In this top down shooter, you have to defeat fiendish zombies, who will come back as invincible ghouls even when you kill them. Fight off the 3 waves and stay awake.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click to Shoot. Zombies get hurt/die by bullets, but ghosts only get knocked back.

You're health is the green pie chart. You have 4 hits before you fall asleep.

Made for Mini Jam 117
